text: Sir Granville Charles Hastings Wheler (1872-1927) was Conservative MP for Faversham from the January 1910 general election until his death. https://web.archive.org/web/20141009222309/http://www.leighrayment.com/commons/Fcommons.htm Leigh's Historical List of MPsWhitaker's Almanack 1907 to 1928 editionsBritish Parliamentary Election Results 1918-1949, compiled and edited by F.W.S. Craig (The Macmillan Press 1979) He previously contested Osgoldcross at the 1906 general election, and the Colne Valley by-election, 1907. ==Sources== Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs for English constituencies Category:Politics of Kent Category:1872 births Category:1927 deaths
title: Sir Granville Wheler, 1st Baronet
